item.title: US and Taliban sign deal aimed at ending war in Afghanistan
item.description: DOHA, Qatar (AP) — Acknowledging a protection power stalemate after when it comes to 2 decades of battle, the United States on Saturday signed a peace settlement with the Taliban that is geared toward ending The US’s longest battle and bringing U.
